content.text: File handling is an important part of any web application. You often need to open and process a file for different tasks.
content.html: File handling is an important part of any web application. You often need to open and process a file for different tasks.

content.text: PHP has several functions for creating, reading, uploading, and editing files.
content.html: PHP has several functions for creating, reading, uploading, and editing files.

content.text: You can do a lot of damage if you do something wrong. Common errors are: editing the wrong file, filling a hard-drive with garbage data, and deleting the content of a file by accident.

content.text: The readfile() function is useful if all you want to do is open up a file and read its contents.
